name: 葉采青
objective: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力。經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論，與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
schedule:
Week	Date	Content
1	Feb. 20	Orientation
2	Feb. 27	Unit 6 Art (ABC)
3	Mar. 06	Unit 6 Art (DE)
4	Mar. 13	Unit 7 Getting Around (ABC)
5	Mar. 20	Unit 7 Getting Around (DE)
6	Mar. 27	Unit 8 Competition (ABC)
7	Apr. 03	Spring break
8	Apr. 10	Unit 8 Competition (DE)
9	Apr. 17	Midterm exam
10	Apr. 24	Unit 9 Danger (ABC)
11	May 01	Unit 9 Danger (CD)
12	May 08	Unit 10 Mysteries (ABC)
13	May 15	Unit 10 Mysteries (DE)
14	May 22	Unit 12 Space (ABC)
15	May 29	Unit 12 Space (DE)
16	Jun. 05	Final exam
17	Jun. 12	Final exam
18	Jun. 19	Final exam
scorePolicy:
Attendance and participation: 35%
Exercise: 30%
Midterm exam: 15%
Final exam: 20%
